title: cygan
author: cygan
created_time: September 21, 2023, 12:05:49 PMLast edit: September 23, 2023, 07:23:32 AM by cygan
content: i would like to present you my new raffle, in which the winner can win 0.003BTCBounty Manager Runwhat is this sweepstakes about and what do I actually have to do to be allowed to participate?you should please guess which of the said and already known bm's (Hhampuz, Little Mouse, icopress, Royse777, yahoo62278, julerz12, ...) will publish the next new BTC signature campaign here in the forum. you can also name other users who might start a campaign.as i said, we are looking for the bounty manager, then which platform will be advertised (casino, mixer, ...) and how much will be the highest weekly payment in this campaign (details can be given in BTC or USD)Rules:the above mentioned bounty managers are unfortunately excluded from the game and you can not choose yourselfall who have registered here in the forum before 01-august-2023 and have at least 10 merits are allowed to participate.if i catch someone who writes to a bm personally (maybe to find out if he will be the 1st one) he will get a negative trust from me and will be excluded from the competition.the raffle will run until a new BTC signature campaign is published.the winner will be evaluated according to the following weighting: bm, platform, paymentif several participants have predicted the correct bm as well as the platform, then the last point (highest payment) will be decisive for who is the winner - the closer you are to the correct amount, the higher your chances of winning.if you overbid the amount you were looking for, you are unfortunately out of the draw.editing your own posts is prohibitedplease use the following form for your participation:Code:Bounty Manager:Platform:Highest Payment (BTC or USD):good luck to ya all!  ü•≥Quote from: Royse777 on September 21, 2023, 05:05:52 PM‚úÇÔ∏èPlease add 1 mBTC from me to make the reward 3 mBTC. Let me know where to send it. I'll take care of it as soon as I can.‚úÇÔ∏è
